      • getHttpSender

        protected HttpSender getHttpSender()

      • loadScript

        public void loadScript(ScriptWrapper scriptW)
                throws IllegalArgumentException
        Load a script and fills in the method's filled according to the values specified by the script. If an error occurs while loading the script, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown. If the method already had a loaded script and a set of values for the parameters, it tries to provide new values for the new parameters if they match any previous parameter names.
        Parameters:
        scriptW - the script wrapper
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException

                      AuthenticationCredentials credentials,
                      User user)

        Description copied from class: AuthenticationMethod
        Performs an authentication in a web application, returning an authenticated.
        Specified by:
        authenticate in class AuthenticationMethod
        Parameters:
